This is my JSC370 Final Project website.

## Showcasing plots {.tabset}

### Figure 1
```{r echo=FALSE}
# Generate random data
set.seed(42) # For reproducibility
x <- rnorm(100)
y <- rnorm(100, mean = 50, sd = 10)
data <- data.frame(x, y)

# Create interactive scatter plot
plot_ly(data, x = ~x, y = ~y, type = 'scatter', mode = 'markers') %>%
  layout(title = 'Interactive Scatter Plot',
         xaxis = list(title = 'Random X'),
         yaxis = list(title = 'Random Y'))
```

### Figure 2
```{r echo=FALSE}
# Generate geographic data
set.seed(42)
locations <- data.frame(
  lon = runif(20, min = -180, max = 180),
  lat = runif(20, min = -90, max = 90),
  place = paste("Location", 1:20)
)

# Create interactive map
leaflet(data = locations) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(~lon, ~lat, popup = ~place)
```
